WorkItem.Description:
Hello together,
 
this evening I saw that a new rawr release came out and I simply loaded my saved character with the new release.
 
With the latest release everything seems to be fine. There was a balance between mitigation, suvival and threat stats which seems to be okay for me.
Now with the new 4.1.02 I'm completely confused cause the addon overrates survival very very much in a way which makes the addon totally unusual for me.
 
First I thought it could depends on the changes with the boss handler or something like that, but after I played around with this tool a little bit I think this assumption has to be wrong.
 
I have no idea where this problem comes from. There were no changes with the ProtWarr-Model in the last release.
WorkItem.Summary: [ProtWarr] Model completely broken with the new release?

Comments.Message: Fixed for next version. The damage taken multipliers were set up wrong in 2 areas last release, when we fixed one of them (due to an edit across all of Rawr) the second bad area would cause this. I fixed this area too and now they line up more like you would expect.
